lexUnit.name: ribbon.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long, narrow strip of fabric, used for tying something or for decoration.

sentence.text: By combining a variety of ribbons of different colours and widths , you can create spectacular 3-D designs ( see far right ) .
Down the ribbon of moonlight , over the brow of the hill , the highwayman came riding , riding , riding , the highwayman came riding .
Meredith was unthreading his monocle from its bloodstained ribbon when Vernon approached .
To top it all I added a red and white ribbon to the crest of my perm .
Her hair is tied back from her face and held by a long white lacy ribbon , but tumbles down loose behind .
` Does n't matter but he must be nice , " Sarah pulled thoughtfully at her pink hair ribbon .
The girl handed her charge to Nanny , who immediately straightened the child 's dress and re-tied her hair ribbon .
The eyes were bright blue and heavily mascaraed in navy and the woman wore a pink ribbon in loosely permed hair that was coloured almost to a shade of orange .
The vendor wore campaign medal ribbons and a black patch over one eye , and there was a card pinned to the tray which said , ` Wounded on the Somme " .
Swiftly , she pulled the hat box from under the bed , and lifted out her straw hat with the red satin ribbons .
She was fiddling absently with the ribbons at her bosom .
So that was how I came to have a new dress and boots and a real ribbon for my hair instead of the usual string .
When he touched a gentle knuckle to her cheek , she started ; her breath lodged somewhere in her throat and she could only stand helplessly as he untied the ribbon securing her hair .
She had taken off the ribbon that kept back her hair and it hung about her shoulders , much longer than Seb had realised .
A red ribbon sat uneasily in her short dark hair and Charlie noticed that her little black shoes and white socks were as spotless as ever .
A quick bath and a change into one of Elinor 's cotton caftans , a blue ribbon to tie up my hair and a dab of powder on my freckles rendered me presentable enough to be fed .
When he took a green ribbon from her and tied it loosely round his waist , Joseph was even more disturbed .
His long black hair was tied into its ponytail with a velvet ribbon , his skin was parchment pale , and his eyes dark .
Usually her blonde hair stretched down to her elbows but on that evening she wore it up , tied with a black ribbon .
She had large , soft eyes and her hair was tied back with a red ribbon .
She liked her hair left long , tying it with a ribbon at the nape of her neck .
Typically Greek , she had long dark hair swept back and tied with a ribbon .
